text: Thomas William Cleverley (born 12 August 1989) is an English football coach and former professional player who played as a midfielder. He is currently head coach at Watford. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League FA Cup FA Cup League Cup League Cup Other
